SELECT LPAD(`docket_no`, 6, 0) AS docket_no, `user_name`, FORMAT(COUNT(`docket_no`), 0) AS reprint_count, DATE_FORMAT(`date_modified`, '%m/%d/%Y') AS reprint_date FROM `docket_print_log`
DATE_FORMAT(`date_modified`, '%m/%d/%Y') BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate#
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(`date_modified`, '%m/%d/%Y'), `docket_no`, `user_name` ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(`date_modified`, '%m/%d/%Y') ASC
